item.title: Download Optical Text Recognition C++ DLL | Aspose.OCR API
item.description: Support Forum Download C++ Library for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.OCR.Cpp and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.OCR.Cpp   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA
